user.title: Cloudflare API Token
user.description: Enter your Cloudflare API token. This token must have permissions to list accounts, list AI models, and run AI completions. Recommended: Use a token with the `Account:Read`, `AI Gateway: Write`, `AI Gateway:Run`, and `Workers AI: Write` permissions for your account. Instructions for creating a token are at https://developers.cloudflare.com/fundamentals/api/get-started/create-token/. The token will be validated before you can continue.

account.title: Select Cloudflare Account
account.description: Choose the Cloudflare account to use for AI completions.

gateway.title: Select AI Gateway
gateway.description: Choose the Cloudflare Gateway to use for AI completions. This allows you to monitor and control your AI usage. For more information, visit https://developers.cloudflare.com/ai-gateway/

new_gateway.title: Create New AI Gateway
new_gateway.description: Create a new Cloudflare AI Gateway to use for AI completions. Gateway should consist of alphanumeric characters and dashes. It must be unique within the account. For more information, visit https://developers.cloudflare.com/ai-gateway/

model.title: Select Model
model.description: Pick a model to use. See supported models at https://developers.cloudflare.com/workers-ai/models/ and model pricing at https://developers.cloudflare.com/workers-ai/platform/pricing/.
